original_title: Dock system in courts to be reformed: Justice Minister
original_body_lines: Justice Minister Dr Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe yesterday announced that he would take steps to reform the dock system in courts where witnesses are expected to provide evidence by getting into a dock. “A system allowing witnesses to give evidence in a dignified manner will be implemented within a year,” he assured.

The Minister additionally declared his intention to reform the dock system in courts, where witnesses are traditionally expected to provide evidence. He assured that a new system enabling witnesses to give evidence in a dignified manner would be implemented within a year.
